file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 72-63-02-05 - STARTER DRAIN ON THE ACCESSORY DRIVE GEARBOX - ADJUSTMENT/TEST

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL STARTER DRAIN ON THE ACCESSORY DRIVE GEARBOX - ADJUSTMENT/TEST EFFECTIVITY: POST-MOD. S.B. AE3007A-72-253 AND PRE-MOD. S.B. AE3007A-72-330 1. General A. This section gives the procedures to do the check of the starter drain adapter of the accessory drive gearbox. B. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY POST-MOD. S.B. AE3007A-72-253 AND 72-63-02-700-801-A ♦ STARTER DRAIN ADAPTER CHECK PRE-MOD. S.B. AE3007A-72-330 EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General 72-63-02 Page 1 of 3 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 72-63-02-700-801-A EFFECTIVITY: POST-MOD. S.B. AE3007A-72-253 AND PRE-MOD. S.B. AE3007A-72-330 2. STARTER DRAIN ADAPTER CHECK A. General (1) Obey these instructions to do the operational check of the starter drain adapter. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM MPP 71-00-00/200 - MAINTENANCE PRACTICES AMM TASK 71-12-01-000-801-A/400 ENGINE LOWER COWLING - OPENING AMM TASK 71-12-01-400-801-A/400 ENGINE LOWER COWLING - CLOSING Rolls-Royce MM CSP 34022 - C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 415 LH Engine 425 RH Engine D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items ITEM DESCRIPTION PURPOSE QTY Commercially Workstand To get access to the engine 1 available F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Engine I. Preparation SUBTASK 841-002-A WARNING: BEFORE YOU DO THE TASK, OBEY THE SAFETY PRECAUTIONS GIVEN IN AMM MPP 71-00-00/200 TO PREVENT INJURY TO PERSONS AND DAMAGE TO MATERIAL. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 700-801-A/500 72-63-02 Page 2 of 3 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL (1) On the circuit breaker panel, open the circuit breaker below and attach a DO-NOT- CLOSE tag to it: • START 1/2. (2) Put the workstand in the work area. (3) Open the lower cowling ( AMM TASK 71-12-01-000-801-A/400). J. Starter Drain Adapter - Operational Check SUBTASK 710-002-A (1) Do an operational check of the starter drain adapter of the accessory drive gearbox. Refer to the latest revision of Rolls-Royce MM CSP 34022. K. Follow-on SUBTASK 842-002-A (1) Close the lower cowling ( AMM TASK 71-12-01-400-801-A/400). (2) Remove the workstand. (3) On the circuit breaker panel, close the circuit breaker below and remove the DO-NOT- CLOSE tag from it. • START 1/2. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 700-801-A/500 72-63-02 Page 3 of 3 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.
